Blog.post: This blog is about www.monto-dash.com and its cool new online store, www.monto-dash.com has been operating as a showcase for Monto, Dublin One (Now in its seventh year) But www.monto-dash.com has just introduced its online shopping features which enable people to review, browse, and buy products 24/7. Customers can opt to receive (USEFUL) Newsletters and otherwise have lots of fun on the site, so give it a shot! Peace.
By the lovely seaside after having a nice swim, I put my phone into a rock pool of sea water. Drying it out over the weekend, Arrrrghhhh. Lets all hope for the best...

Aside from the fact that google is off my favorites list, orkut seems a little strange, I'm sure its fun, just like everything in life when there are lots of people hanging out but I'm gonna stay away for a number of reasons: 1. Unsolicitated mails from loads of people who know people who know you. 2. Who is this Orkut guy anyway, how come he lets us hang out in his place all the time for free? Maybe its cause of this; from orkuts terms of service: " By submitting, posting or displaying any Materials on or through the orkut.com service, you automatically grant to us a worldwide, non-exclusive, sublicenseable, transferable, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable right to copy, distribute, create derivative works of, publicly perform and display such Materials." 3. www.gmail-is-too-creepy.com/ 4. www.google-watch.org/ 5. Oscar Wilde: " I suppose society is wonderfully delightful. To be in it is merely a bore. But to be out of it is simply a tragedy. " Thank you for the Invitation though.

Okay, that samsung phone is rockin, its absolutely perfect after its swim except the battery flaked out so I've ordered a new one, should be here on monday or tuesday which is great. The week was well, weather was so nice, got an email from meris... thinking about going to galway tomorrow, but going to cassidy's for a guinness now though, more later...
